line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups Plain yogurt or sour cream
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 1/2 cups Plain yogurt or sour cream")

line.originaltext: 1/4 cup lemon juice
1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
1/2 teaspoon celery seed
1/2 teaspoon Hungarian sweet paprika
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
line.annotation: create_ing(ing8, "8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves")

line.originaltext: 2 cups fine dry bread crumbs
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "2 cups fine dry bread crumbs")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine first eight ingredients.
In a large bowl, combine first eight ingredients.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing10, "mixture", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine first eight ingredients.
Place chicken in mixture and turn to coat.
Place chicken in mixture and turn to coat.
line.annotation: mix(ing11, t0, ing12, "coated chicken", "turn to coat")

line.originaltext: Cover and marinate overnight in the refrigerator.
line.annotation: do(ing12,"cover and marinate overnight in a refrigerator")

line.originaltext: Remove chicken from marinade; coat each piece with crumbs.
Remove chicken from marinade; coat each piece with crumbs.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing9}, ing15, "chicken with crumbs", "coat each piece with crumbs")

line.originaltext: Arrange on a shallow baking pan.
Arrange on a shallow baking pan.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until juices run clear.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until juices run clear.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until juices run clear.
line.annotation: cook(ing15, t2, ing16, "cooked chicken", "45 minutes or until juices run clear")
